methods.name: computeOffsets
methods.docblock: Offsets the popover by the arrow size
methods.description: Offsets the popover by the arrow size

isShowingContent.description: Whether or not the `<Popover />` content is shown

defaultIsShowingContent.description: Whether or not to show the content by default, when uncontrolled

on.description: The action that causes the content to display (`click`, `hover`, `focus`)

withArrow.description: Whether or not an arrow pointing to the trigger should be rendered

color.description: Color variant of the popover content

shadow.description: Controls the shadow depth for the `<Popover />`

stacking.description: Controls the z-index depth for the `<Popover />` content

contentRef.description: A function that returns a reference to the content element

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| Node
| Window
| ReactElement
| Component
| (() => Node | Window | null | undefined)
| null

defaultFocusElement.description: An element or a function returning an element to focus by default

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| (() => (Element | null)[])
| (() => Element | null)
| (Element | null)[]
| Element
| null

liveRegion.description:
An element, function returning an element, or array of elements that will
not be hidden from the screen reader when the `<Popover />` is open

screenReaderLabel.description: An accessible label for the `<Popover />` content

offsetX.description: The horizontal offset for the positioned content

offsetY.description: The vertical offset for the positioned content

placement.description:
The placement of the content in relation to the trigger

One of: 'top', 'bottom', 'start', 'end', 'top start', 'top center',
'top end', 'top stretch', 'bottom start', 'bottom center', 'bottom end',
'bottom stretch', 'start top', 'start center', 'start bottom',
'start stretch', 'end top', 'end center', 'end bottom', 'end stretch',
'center start', 'center end', 'offscreen'

constrain.description:
The parent in which to constrain the popover.

One of: 'window', 'scroll-parent', 'parent', 'none', an element,
or a function returning an element

mountNode.description:
An element or a function returning an element to use as the mount node
for the `<Popover />` (defaults to `document.body`)

positionTarget.description: Target element for positioning the Popover (if it differs from the trigger)

positionContainerDisplay.description: Set the CSS `display` property on the `<span>` container element of the underlying Position component

insertAt.description: Insert the element at the 'top' of the mountNode or at the 'bottom'

id.description: An id is generated if not supplied.

shouldAlignArrow.description: Whether or not the content should offset to align by its arrow

shouldTrackPosition.description: Whether or not position should be tracked or just set on initial render

shouldRenderOffscreen.description: Should the `<Popover />` render offscreen when visually hidden

shouldContainFocus.description: Whether focus should contained within the `<Popover/>` when it is open

shouldReturnFocus.description: Whether focus should be returned to the trigger when the `<Popover/>` is closed

shouldCloseOnDocumentClick.description: Should the `<Popover />` hide when clicks occur outside the content

shouldCloseOnEscape.description: Should the `<Popover />` hide when the escape key is pressed

shouldFocusContentOnTriggerBlur.description: Should the content become focused when the trigger is blurred

onShowContent.description:
Callback fired when content is shown. When controlled, this callback is
fired when the Popover expects to be shown

tsType.name: signature

onHideContent.description:
Callback fired when content is hidden. When controlled, this callback is
fired when the Popover expects to be hidden

onPositioned.description:
Callback fired when content has been is initially positioned.
If `shouldRenderOffscreen` is true, it will only fire once, the first
time the content is shown

onPositionChanged.description: Callback fired when the position changes

onClick.description: Callback fired when component is clicked

onFocus.description: Callback fired when trigger is focused

onBlur.description: Callback fired when component is blurred

onMouseOver.description: Callback fired when mouse is over trigger

onMouseOut.description: Callback fired when mouse leaves trigger

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

renderTrigger.description: The element that triggers the popover

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

children.description: The content to be shown by the popover

elementRef.description: Provides a reference to the underlying HTML root element

borderWidth.description:
Allowed values: 0, 'none', 'small', 'medium', 'large'.

Accepts the familiar CSS shorthand to designate border widths corresponding to edges. (e.g. 'none large none large).

Only applies to a Popover without an arrow.

shouldSetAriaExpanded.description:
If true (default), then the aria-expanded prop is added to the trigger.
If its supplied via the aria-expanded prop then it takes the given value,
otherwise its calculated automatically based on whether the content is shown.

title: Popover
